title.rendered: Restaurant Red Flags: How To Know Where To Dine Might Not Be Fine

content.rendered: Americans are on pace to set a new record for spending on dining out this year. To prepare for the massive restaurant crowd, Founder and President of Playground Hospitality Doug Roth joined the WBBM Noon Business Hour to discuss the red flags that could signal an eatery may not be up to snuff.
